sections.heading: out of court; record.Orders made out of court shall be forthwith entered by the clerk in the record of the court in the same manner as orders made in term

sections.text:
25-915.Orders out of court; record.

Orders made out of court shall be forthwith entered by the clerk in the record of the court in the same manner as orders made in term.

SourceR.S.1867, Code § 579, p. 495;R.S.1913, § 7731;C.S.1922, § 8675;C.S.1929, § 20-915;R.S.1943, § 25-915;Laws 2018, LB193, § 11.
